content: to last stitch m1l k1 on both needles 16 20 24 28 32 sts round 3 k3 m1r knit to last 3 stitches m1l k3 on both needles 20 24 28 32 36 sts round 4 k1 m1r knit to last stitch m1l k1 on both needles 24 28 32 36 40 sts round 5 k3 m1r knit to last 3 stitches m1l k3 on both needles 28 32 36 40 44 sts round 6 knit on both needles round 7 k1 m1r knit to last stitch m1l k1 on both needles 32 36 40 44 48 sts round 8 k3 m1r knit to last 3 stitches m1l k3 on both needles 36 40 44 48 52 sts round 9 knit on both needles repeat round 9 until it s time to start the gusset the general rule for heels of this type is to begin the gusset when the sock touches your ankle when you try it on if this is a gift and you have no foot to test it on knit until you reach about 3 3 25 3 5 3 75 4 less than the total inches of the shoe size women s shoe sizes us 4 4 5 5 5 5 6 6 5 7 7 5 8 8 5 9 9 5 10 10 5 11 11 5 12 ca 4 4 5 5 5 5 6 6 5 7 7 5 8 8 5 9 9 5 10 10 5 11 11 5 12 uk 2 2 5 3 3 5 4 4 5 5 5 5 6 6 5 7 7 5 8 8 5 9 9 5 10 eu 35 35 35/36 36 36/37 37 37/38 38 38/39 39 39/40 40 40/41 41 41/42 42 42/43 in 8 2 8 3 8 5 8 8 8 9 9 1 9 3 9 4 9 5 9 7 9 9 10 10 2 10 3 10 5 10 7 10 9 cm 20 8 21 3 21 6 22 2 22 5 23 23 5 23 8 24 1 24 6 25 1 25 4 25 9 26 2 26 7 27 1 27 6 men s shoe sizes us 6 6 5 7 7 5 8 8 5 9 9 5 10 10 5 11 11 5 12 13 14 15 16 ca 6 6 5 7 7 5 8 8 5 9 9 5 10 10 5 11 11 5 12 13 14 15 16 uk 5 5 6 6 5 7 735 8 8 5 9 9 5 10 10 5 11 11 5 12 5 13 5 14 5 15 5 eu 39 39 40 40/41 41 41/42 42 42/43 43 43/44 44 44/45 45 46 47 48 49 in 9 25 9 5 9 6 9 8 10 10 1 10 3 10 5 10 6 10 7 10 9 11 1 11 3 11 6 11 9 12 2 12 6 cm 24 8 25 1
